channel.title: "A Little Piece Of Heaven" Model Page
channel.description: for now on me and amy will post our progress on our models here. will hopefully be able to add some pics soon just gotta find the time. we are probably gunna work on a new dragon next. and maybe some other unique bosses to add into the server.

item.title: "A Little Piece Of Heaven" Model Page
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“poopler40, post:9, topic:518655”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=636919.msg4300562#msg4300562 date=1368917803]

thanks howd you know it was daedric replica?
i made the base for most of these then amy with her modeling skills came back and made them look 20x better

i played skyrim a lot

i looked at the sword and it striked a resemblance, i asked myself “wait that looks familiar” and i looked at the shield and then the helmet and went “yep thats daedric”

well glad you noticed haha, theres this kid in my class whos got a sick ass alienware laptop said it was 3000 dollars and he said he played skyrim a lot i wanna show him but all my rs related stuff stays out of my real life lol. im in secrecy
[/quote]

lol i keep my two lives separate too[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: "A Little Piece Of Heaven" Model Page
